contentrichtext.text: {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Les Authieux-Papion}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Les Authieux-Papion |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Lisieux |canton = Mézidon-Canon |INSEE = 14031 |postal code = 14140 |mayor = Jean-Pierre Perthuis |term = 2001–2008 |intercommunality = Vallée d'Auge |longitude = 0.0539 |latitude = 49.0658 |elevation m = 59 |elevation min m = 30 |elevation max m = 79 |area km2 = 4.28 |population = 63 |population date = 2008 }} '''Les Authieux-Papion''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Demographics== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|94 |1968|78 |1975|78 |1982|61 |1990|53 |1999|60 |2008|63 }} {{clear-left}} ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Calvados communes}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Authieuxpapion}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
